text: Ke timile ti munaphikaharu (kapati) la'i dekhenau, jasale aphna kaphira bha'iharusita jo kitabavala chan bhanne gardachan, ki yadi timila'i desanikala gariyo bhane, niscaya nai hami pani timro sathama niskera janechaum, ra timro barema kahilyai kasaiko bhana'i manne chainaum, ra yadi timisamga lada'i bhayo bhane timro sahayata garnechaum, tara allaha saksi cha, ki yiniharu jhutha chan
